question: Which one of the following stars is nearest to the earth?
explanation: Sun is the nearest star to the earth. The nearest stars except sun to Earth are in the Alpha Centauri triple-star system, about 4.37 light-years away. One of these stars, Proxima Centauri, is slightly closer, at 4.24 light-years. Of all the stars closer than 15 light-years, only two are spectral type G, similar to our sun: Alpha Centauri A and Tau Ceti.
